text: Private candidates who wish to apply for the March 2016 SSLC exams under the tatkal scheme can register their applications online on Thursday and Friday, V.Murugan, Regional Deputy Director of Government Examinations, Tiruchi, said in a press release. Candidates should pay an examination fee of Rs.625, including Rs.500 as tatkal fee, and Rs.50 as registration fee. The fees should be paid in cash at the service centres. The number provided in the registration slip should be used later for downloading hall the tickets. Further details can be had from the website:www.tndge.in
title: SSLC exams
